Class ServerController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.galaxytrucker.Controller.Server.ServerController
public class ServerController extends Object
ServerController is responsible for managing the game state and communicating with clients. It handles updates to the game, notifies clients of changes, and processes user inputs.

  • Method Details

    • getGame

      public static it.polimi.ingsw.galaxytrucker.Model.GamePackage.Game getGame()

    • setRmiPlayers

      public void setRmiPlayers(List<VirtualClient> rmiClients)

    • setSocketPlayers

      public void setSocketPlayers(List<SocketClientHandler> socketClients)

    • updateView

      public void updateView(it.polimi.ingsw.galaxytrucker.Model.GamePackage.Game game, String message)
      Updates the view of the game for all connected clients. This method is called whenever there is a change in the game state. It uses two separate threads to handle RMI and socket clients.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is an error during the remote method call

    • handleUserInput

      public void handleUserInput(it.polimi.ingsw.galaxytrucker.Network.Message msg, ObjectOutputStream objOut) throws IOException
      Handles user input from a SOCKET client. This method processes the input command and its parameters, executing the appropriate game actions.
      Parameters:
      msg - the message containing the user input
      objOut - the output stream to send responses back to the client
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while sending messages

    • executeCommand

      public void executeCommand(String command, List<String> firstParameters, List<String> secondParameters, ObjectOutputStream objOut, it.polimi.ingsw.galaxytrucker.Network.Message msg) throws IOException
      Executes the command received from the client. This method processes various game commands and sends appropriate responses back to the client.
      Parameters:
      command - the command to execute
      firstParameters - the first set of parameters for the command
      secondParameters - the second set of parameters for the command
      objOut - the output stream to send responses back to the client
      msg - the message containing additional information (e.g., nickname)
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while sending messages

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect(String nickname)
      Checks if the player with the given nickname is connected to the game.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player to check.

    • handleUserInput

      public void handleUserInput(VirtualClient client, String input) throws RemoteException
      Handles user input from a RMIClient.
      Parameters:
      client - The VirtualClient instance representing the client.
      input - The input string from the client.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is an error during remote method invocation.

    • checkPlayer

      public it.polimi.ingsw.galaxytrucker.Model.PlayerShip.Player checkPlayer(String nickname)
      Check if a player with the given nickname is in the game.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player to check.
      Returns:
      The Player instance if found, or null if not found.

    • validTilePosition

      public boolean validTilePosition(int row, int col)
      Validates the tile position based on the game rules.
      Parameters:
      row - The row of the tile.
      col - The column of the tile.
      Returns:
      True if the position is valid, false otherwise.
